summary: April 21 is the 111th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Carey Hayes  is an American screenwriter and producer. He is the twin brother of Chad Hayes. They are partners in the business and have written most of their work together. The two also appeared in Doublemint Gum commercials in their early years of acting in the 1980s.
He has written episodes of Baywatch and Baywatch Nights and has written and co-produced the TV show The Crow: Stairway to Heaven.
^ a b c "IMDB Carey Hayes". Retrieved 2011-01-14.
title: Carey Hayes
